parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of rows/columns in the matrix

parameters.name: autorun
parameters.description: Should stimulus be presented automatically for a fixed time. 1 if yes, 0 if no, in which case it awaits participants keypress.

parameters.name: prestime
parameters.description: How long the stimulus should be presented, if autorun is non-zero (in ms).

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Time between study and test, in ms
